backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping Valentine’s experience features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for key frontend files in the Valentine’s experience.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling scene flow, preloading, and transitions.
frontend/src/components/valentine/assets: Exports paths for all Valentine scene images and audio assets.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Letter: Exports the exact Valentine’s letter text for display.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Loadin: Loading overlay with progress bar and themed visuals during asset preload.
frontend/src/components/valentine/MovieT: Scene with drifting clickable movie ticket that reveals details and triggers progression.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Openin: Interactive mailbox scene showing envelope and letter, triggering audio and scroll progression.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Scratc: React component showing a scratch-off frame that reveals an illustration and message once 60% scratched.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the authenticated Internet Identity, refetching on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAmbientAudio.ts: Hook that loads, plays, and stops looping background audio.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetPreloader.ts: Preloads images and audio, tracking load progress and completion state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handles login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty file placeholder because the backend has no methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useScratchOffCanvas.t: Manages scratch-off canvas behavior, tracking scratched percentage via pointer events.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom vintage-themed colors, fonts, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, required interactive Valentine’s Day features, needed image assets, and notes on regressions and architectural flow. Includes existing feature definitions, known issues, and a flag indicating this is a fix request.
